name: The Little Tales Of Alexandria
description:
Description

The Little Tales Of Alexandria is a retro short story driven exploration game for Gameboy and Analogue pocket. Staging inside a apartment block, featuring 15 plus different apartments all with there own tale to tell.

Talk to the tenants, and interact with almost ANYTHING and EVERYTHING in and out of there homes, including cats!

One quest. Explore, interact and have fun! :3

Can you get to the roof?

introduction

Moving in to a apartment block can be hard at first, best you meet your new neighbours and get to know them. But how much do you really want to know?

Features

15 plus apartments

Intractable world

Interesting and unique characters

Cats!

Over 1700 Words of dialogue

Super Gameboy support 

Easter eggs

3 Big hidden secrets (to find)

-REDACTED SPOILER-

Interact

Interact with objects and items! 

When you walk up too objects a Question mark or Expansion mark appears, telling you what you want to know!

Save! 

Save at Meow stations (Also called cats) through out the game!



Neighbours!

Visit each of your neighbours! See what there up too and get to know them!

Controls

Movement

Up, down, left and right for directional walking!

A, for confirm.

B, for back.

Start, for umm… Start the game! :D

Systems

Download includes for multiple platforms.

Made for the original Gameboy, Forward compatible with pocket, light, colour,  advance and sp! 

Supporting flashcards and your favourite emulator or emulation device!

Got a Analogue pocket? Play it on there! With the .pocket game file!

File types

Gameboy .gb files:

MBC5, Default. Use this one for General use!

These, are for self made carts.

MBC5, Batteryless 

MBC3, Normal

MBC3, Batteryless

Analogue pocket:

.pocket file

Tested on original hardware! And complete!

Credits

The amazing GB studio engine!

And… oh! Me :3

Behind the scenes (The Little Tales of Alexandria)

This folder is in addition to the game, including behind the scenes info, images and old builds of the game.

Hello there! I’m MrE!

I’m the one man developer of this game. I’m also a author over on Amazon! Through kindle or even on real paperback books!

If you like my game, I would very much appreciate a donation! Through the download button.

I am looking forward, into the future to develop this into a series! And to keep improving. Depending on how things go.
